attributes.action: Provide accommodation for front line workers to reduce the spread of COVID-19
attributes.background: Front line workers are putting their lives at risk, day in, day out, to help fight against the virus. Many live with vulnerable people who are more at risk of catching the virus. Therefore, the government should provide front line workers with accommodation to allow them to protect their loved ones.

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/310594

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
